datetime.title: Datetime
datetime.description: Time at which the interval starts.

resolutioncode.title: Resolution code
resolutioncode.description: Length of the time interval expressed in compliance with ISO 8601.

measured.title: Measured & Upscaled
measured.description: The value running average measured for the reported time interval.

mostrecentconfidence10.title: Most recent P10
mostrecentconfidence10.description: Most recently forecasted volume with a probability of less than 10% that a lower volume will be produced.

mostrecentconfidence90.title: Most recent P90
mostrecentconfidence90.description: Most recently forecasted volume with a probability of less than 10% that a higher volume will be produced.

dayahead11hconfidence10.title: Day Ahead 11AM P10
dayahead11hconfidence10.description: Day-ahead forecasted volume with a probability of less than 10% that a lower volume will be produced, published at 11AM.

dayahead11hconfidence90.title: Day Ahead 11AM P90
dayahead11hconfidence90.description: Day-ahead forecasted volume with a probability of less than 10% that a higher volume will be produced, published at 11AM.

dayaheadforecast.title: Day-ahead 6PM forecast
dayaheadforecast.description: Day-ahead forecasted volume to be produced.

dayaheadconfidence10.title: Day-ahead 6PM P10
dayaheadconfidence10.description: Day-ahead forecasted volume with a probability of less than 10% that a lower volume will be produced.

dayaheadconfidence90.title: Day-ahead 6PM P90
dayaheadconfidence90.description: Forecasted volume with a probability of less than 10% that a higher volume will be produced.

weekaheadconfidence10.title: Week-ahead P10
weekaheadconfidence10.description: Week-ahead forecasted volume with a probability of less than 10% that a lower volume will be produced.

weekaheadconfidence90.title: Week-ahead P90
weekaheadconfidence90.description: Week-ahead forecasted volume with a probability of less than 10% that a higher volume will be produced.

loadfactor.title: Load factor
loadfactor.description: The percentage ratio between measured power generation and the total monitored power capacity.
